actions.command: execute at @a if score @s lurker = @p lurker run forceload add ~ ~ ~ ~
execute at @a if score @s lurker = @p lurker run power grant @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=lurk_eye,type=allay] manhunt:lurker/lurk/eye_effects
execute at @a if score @p lurker = @s lurker run tp @p @s
execute as @a if score @s lurker = @e[tag=lurk,limit=1,sort=nearest] lurker run power remove @s manhunt:lurker/lurk/lurk_effects
